scripts.test-message: echo "Open the HTML files in the tests directory to run the tests."
scripts.dist: run-s typescript build-dev build build-electron post-dist
scripts.build-dev: parcel build -d dist --no-minify --target browser --global fluid -o fluid-dom-dev.js lib/fluid-dom.js
scripts.build: parcel build -d dist --target browser --global fluid -o fluid-dom.js lib/fluid-dom.js
scripts.build-electron: parcel build -d dist --target electron -o electron-fluid-dom.js lib/fluid-dom.js
